data.title: Fun food for you
data.text: The many many time we have eaten there have been very pleasant.  the salads are fresh, soups hot and filling, and sandwiches are made with their fresh bread.

data.title: Good choice of soups and salads
data.text: A nice break from heavy food. Good varieties of soups and salads. Reasonably priced. Also have a nice clam chowder soup.

data.title: A great selection of fine European style bread.
data.text: I have been coming here for years. A little pricy but excellent bread and pastries. The baguettes are extremely good.

data.title: Good option close to hotels
data.text: The LaBoulanger is quite huge. It is in the city center of cupertino and in a walking distance of some hotels. The service is ok and the food is as good as we can expect of a LaBoulanger restaurant.

data.title: Varity
data.text: We had breakfast here and there is a wide variety of options from omelet sandwiches to pastries to oatmeal.

data.title: If you love sandwiches made with great bread, this is your place
data.text:
A good bakery is hard to find, especially in Silicon Valley.  Le Boulanger bakes their own bread, and that is the reason to go there as the bread makes the simple sandwich wonderful.  Meats, cheeses and fillings are all fresh.  They make some great soups that rotate daily, and offer a bread bowl which is especially good with clam chowder or Le Bou's Cream of Chicken. Every product is high quality; sandwiches are made to order exactly to your specification. Who knew a sandwich could be so exciting. 

Back to that great bread: you can choose which type of bread that you want on your sandwich. You can buy loaves of bread: Sweet French, Dutch  Crunch (a fan favorite in loaf or sliced bread), Sourdough and some Wheat/Healthy types. There is a nice kids menu, with small sandwiches and a cookie.  For breakfast, there are all sorts of great Danish's, cinnamon rolls, bagels ,and coffee cakes.   A perfect dinner roll is made in white or wheat flour that is wonderful at Thanksgiving but just great to eat with dinner everyday.

The only downside in coming to the bakery is that it is hard to park when going  to Le Boulanger Cupertino.  Since the bakery is on the ground floor of an office/condo plaza, you have to turn into the parking garage which is directly behind the bakery, off Stevens Creek Blvd.  Once you park there for the first time, you will have no problem parking there the next time.  Once you eat the sandwiches, you will be a fan of Le Boulanger and will not care about the parking!

data.title: Good bakery and sandwitch place...
data.text: If you really like bakery items, you need to visit this place. The ambiance is good, very spacious and the location can't be any better. Parking is a bit tricky, but not bad. You can enjoy the outside either watching the traffic or a water falls on the side. Good place to take the kids - during xmas, it is pretty with the lighted tree.

data.title: Does exactly what you want it to!
data.text: Really good, wholesome selection of baked produce. Really good selection and really good quality. Could do with a bit more fresh produce/fruit/juices, but we'll happily be going back for lunches!

data.title: Great spot for breakfast pastries, breads, egg sandwiches, and lunch
data.text: I have been here multiple times whenever I visit Cupertino. I eat their pastries, breads, egg sandwiches, and lunches served on their delicious breads. I enjoy their Pete's coffee, and I like the casual atmosphere. The only downside is the parking in the underground garage which is hard to locate if you have not been there before and sometimes it is very crowded down there so I park close-by and walk. Our favorite breakfast sandwich is the vegetable medley. They have a great rewards program so if you go there frequently be sure to sign up for it and you will earn free items.

data.title: Wonderful bake goods!
data.text: They open at 6am and have wonderful baked goods!  They are across the courtyard from the Cypress Hotel.  The prices are reasonable.  We would go when they opened to pick up a breakfast sandwich and toast.   Love their bread.  Staff are very friendly.  I would go back when we stay in Cupertino in the future.

data.title: My favorite quick breakfast place
data.text: Friendly and casual atmosphere.  Great value for the food.  My favorite breakfast is the vegetable medley sandwich.

data.title: Rarely able to find it open
data.text:
Not that they dont have a listed time but they are closed even otherwise. So many times I've tried to get there but they always close before time. Bakery is great. Bread is awesome. Love the cinnamon rolls. Coffee is average. But they are always closed before dark. or even earlier sometimes.
Its for the high calorie cravings however. I can't find anything thats a little lighter.

data.title: World Class Sandwiches
data.text: The Classic is my favorite and is done perfectly every time.  You can add/subtract ingredients and the customer nature of the sandwiches makes them a "do not miss" if you want a great lunch.  Prices are good, locations are good, sides are good...a do not miss for lunch.

data.title: Casual, tasty.
data.text:
Nice place to have an espresso and pastries in the morning with friends.  Pretty good breakfast sandwiches too. 

Kinda reminds me of an airport restaurant.

data.title: They have perfect-sized pastries!!!
data.text:
Excellent place to go for breakfast or lunch (I haven't had dinner there yet) with free WiFi.  
The size of their pastries is just right, and their soups are tasty and decent portions as well.  They have several vegan plates, which I appreciate.  I'm glad they're walking distance from the hotel!

data.title: Yummy
data.text: My husband and I got the bagel egg sandwiches in the morning and they were very good!

data.title: Nice atmosphere and great location
data.text: Good place for breakfasts and simple lunches; well located right at Cupertino city center.

data.title: 少し味が濃いめ
data.text:
ホテルの近くだったので、一回だけ利用しました。
スープとハーフのサンドイッチのセットでしたが、ハーフといえどもサンドイッチはかなり大きめでした。
それに甘いパンを一つ食べて、お腹がいっぱいでした。
クラムチャウダーは少し塩辛かったです。

data.title: Boa opção
data.text: Opção melhor, em rapidez e variedade, do que o restaurante do Cypress Hotel, que fica ao lado, no café da manhã.
